Dr. Rubén R. Ferradás

Position: Postdoc

Email: rubenferradas@gmail.com

Website: https://rferradas.com

Education

  • 2016: Ph.D. in Condensed Matter Physics, Universidad de Oviedo (UNIOVI), Oviedo, Spain.
  • 2010: M.S. in Condensed Matter Physics, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid (UAM), Madrid, Spain.
  • 2009: B.S. in Physics, Universidad de Vigo (UVIGO), Spain.

Experience

  • 2016-2019: Postdoc with the project 'Magneto-Optical properties of Solids from TDCDFT', Laboratoire de Chimie et Physique Quantiques (LCPQ, Université Paul Sabatier), Toulouse, France.

Research Topics

  • Electron correlation, Coulomb holes and Density Functional development.
  • Time-Dependent (Current)-Density Functional Theory
  • Theory and Modelization of electronic structure
  • Development of ab initio codes for the study of electronic structure
